   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome To Logger's Documentation!
===================================

**Logger**  is a Python module that provides a logging functionality with various configuration options. 
It allows you to log messages to both a file and the console, with different log levels and formats..

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

=========
